title: Prime Minister Launches New Digital India Initiative
text: The Prime Minister launched a program to expand broadband access in rural areas and support digital literacy.

title: Government Announces Free Internet for All
text: The government officially declared a plan to provide free internet access nationwide by 2026.

title: India Launches First Green Hydrogen Train
text: Indian Railways launched the nation’s first hydrogen-powered train to promote clean energy.

title: ISRO Successfully Launches Communication Satellite
text: ISRO placed a communication satellite into orbit to enhance national connectivity and disaster response.

title: Union Budget Allocates More Funds for Education and Infrastructure
text: The recent national budget increased allocations for schools, roads, and public transport.

title: Government Launches Affordable Healthcare Scheme for Senior Citizens
text: A new scheme was unveiled to provide subsidized medical treatment and health insurance for elderly citizens.

title: Indian Cricketer Scores Century, Leads Team to Victory
text: A top batsman scored a match-winning century in a major international cricket series.

title: City Begins Tree Plantation Drive to Improve Air Quality
text: Municipal authorities started planting thousands of trees to tackle pollution and urban heat.

title: Health Ministry Reports Drop in Malaria Cases After Campaign
text: A targeted campaign led to a significant decline in malaria incidence in affected districts.

title: Indian Startup Raises Series B Funding for Renewable Energy
text: A Bengaluru-based startup secured investment to scale its solar storage technology across India.

title: National Museum Reopens After Renovation
text: The national museum unveiled refurbished galleries showcasing cultural artifacts and modern displays.

title: India Hosts International Climate Summit
text: India hosted leaders to discuss climate cooperation and announced stronger emission reduction targets.

title: Supreme Court Rules to Strengthen Environmental Protections
text: The court issued a decision tightening pollution controls for industrial projects near rivers.

title: College Announces Scholarship Program for Underprivileged Students
text: A university launched scholarships to increase access to higher education for low-income families.

title: Major Port Upgrades to Boost Export Capacity
text: Port authorities completed infrastructure upgrades to speed up cargo handling and exports.

title: Public Transport App Integrates Multi-Modal Options
text: A new feature allows passengers to plan trips using buses, metro, and bike-sharing in one app.

title: Shocking Discovery: Aliens Found in Backyard
text: A fake article claims aliens were discovered in someone's backyard.

title: Celebrity Claims Drinking Bleach Cures COVID
text: A social media influencer falsely claimed that drinking bleach can cure COVID-19.

title: Scientists Say Earth Will Explode Next Week
text: A viral post falsely claims scientists predicted the Earth would explode due to magnetic field changes.

title: Facebook to Start Charging Monthly Fees
text: A viral hoax claimed Facebook will charge users $5 per month to continue using the app.

title: Aliens Spotted in New York City
text: An edited video showing UFOs in Times Square went viral but was proven false.

title: Bank To Convert All Savings To Cryptocurrency Overnight
text: A hoax statement asserts banks will convert savings accounts to crypto, which is false.

title: Government To Provide Free Gold To Every Household Next Year
text: A viral claim that the government will distribute gold to all households has no official confirmation.

title: Schools To Close Permanently From Next Month
text: A circulating message falsely claims nationwide school closures without any government announcement.

title: Toll Booths To Start Charging For Breathing On Highways
text: A satirical claim being shared as real; it is false and intended to mislead.

title: Weather App Predicts Permanent Snow In Southern India
text: A fake report claims climate reversal causing constant snow in southern India.

title: Doctors Recommend Drinking River Water For Better Health
text: A false and dangerous health claim circulating online; official health bodies warn against it.

title: Contaminated Water In Major City Causes Instant Paralysis
text: A sensational post claims a city's water supply causes paralysis; health officials have debunked it.

title: Local Hero Revealed As Alien Agent In Secret Files
text: A bizarre hoax claims a local celebrity is an extraterrestrial; entirely fabricated.

title: Secret ISRO Mission Confirms Life On Moon
text: An unverified report claims ISRO found life on the moon; no credible evidence supports it.

title: Famous Actor Arrested For Satanic Rituals
text: A false viral post shows doctored images and baseless allegations against a public figure.

title: ATM Machines To Dispense Free Cash This Weekend
text: A scam message promises free cash from ATMs and is designed to trick people.

title: Country To Ban Mobile Phones For All Citizens Next Year
text: A hoax message asserts an absurd nationwide ban on phones; no such policy exists.

title: New Law Allows Companies To Evict Tenants Without Notice
text: A fabricated story misrepresents proposed regulations; no such law exists.

title: Massive Salary Hike For Government Employees Announced Secretly
text: Rumors of sudden huge pay raises for government staff are untrue and not announced officially.

title: PM Modi Launches Clean Energy Drive
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi launched a new initiative to promote solar and wind energy across India.

title: Actor Claims He Can Stop Rain With Meditation
text: A self-proclaimed guru claimed he could stop rainfall through meditation, which scientists dismissed as false.

title: India Wins Cricket World Cup 2023
text: India defeated Australia to win the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 in Ahmedabad.

title: Government to Provide Free Wi-Fi in Villages
text: The Indian government announced free Wi-Fi access in 100,000 rural villages by 2026.

title: Alien Ship Lands in Mumbai
text: A viral post falsely claimed an alien spaceship landed near the Gateway of India.

title: ISRO Successfully Tests Reusable Rocket
text: ISRO has successfully tested its reusable launch vehicle prototype in Sriharikota.

title: Man Grows Extra Arm After Eating Street Food
text: A fake article claimed a man grew an extra arm after eating street food in Delhi.

title: Chandrayaan-3 Finds Signs of Sulphur on Moon
text: ISRO confirmed the presence of sulphur on the Moon’s surface during the Chandrayaan-3 mission.

title: Government Announces Free Education for All Girls
text: The Indian government announced free education schemes for girls up to graduation.

title: Bollywood Star Marries Alien
text: A fake report circulated online claiming a Bollywood actor married an alien from Mars.

title: WHO Approves India-Made COVID Vaccine
text: WHO officially approved India’s Covaxin for global emergency use.

title: Facebook To Charge Rs 500 Monthly
text: A viral message falsely claims Facebook will charge users Rs 500 per month.

title: India Launches First Hydrogen Train
text: Indian Railways launched the country’s first green hydrogen-powered train.

title: Man Says Earth Is Flat, Builds Rocket To Prove It
text: A conspiracy theorist from Chennai claims the Earth is flat and plans to prove it using a homemade rocket.

title: Government Plans Electric Vehicle Subsidy
text: Centre announces new subsidy policy to promote electric vehicle manufacturing in India.

title: Scientists Say Earth Will Explode Next Week
text: A viral hoax falsely claims scientists predicted Earth’s destruction next week.

title: Google Opens New Office In Hyderabad
text: Google inaugurated its largest office campus outside the US in Hyderabad.

title: Astrologer Predicts End Of Internet
text: An astrologer falsely claims the world will lose internet connectivity forever in 2025.

title: India Develops New Cancer Drug
text: Indian scientists developed a new affordable cancer drug with promising results.

title: Man Arrested For Selling Fake Currency With Gandhi Emoji
text: Police arrested a man for selling fake currency printed with emojis.

title: Railways Introduces AI Ticket Checking
text: Indian Railways deployed AI-based systems for faster ticket verification.

title: Temple In Varanasi Floats In Air
text: Fake news spread claiming a temple in Varanasi was floating in the air.

title: Kerala Tops Education Index 2025
text: Kerala ranked first in India’s National Education Index for 2025.

title: Government to Ban Oxygen Cylinders
text: A fake report claimed the government planned to ban oxygen cylinders.

title: Delhi Metro Introduces Women-Only Coaches
text: Delhi Metro announced the addition of women-only coaches for safety.

title: Aliens Seen At Taj Mahal
text: Hoax photos went viral showing aliens visiting the Taj Mahal.

title: RBI Introduces Digital Rupee
text: The Reserve Bank of India launched pilot testing of India’s Digital Rupee.

title: Actor Says Sun Rises In West
text: A fake video claimed a Bollywood actor said the sun rises in the west.

title: India Wins Gold in Olympics Hockey
text: India’s men’s hockey team won gold at the 2024 Paris Olympics.

title: Rainwater Can Cure Cancer
text: A fake WhatsApp message claimed drinking rainwater can cure cancer.

title: Chennai Startup Launches AI Robot Farmer
text: An Indian startup has developed an AI-powered robot that assists in farming.

title: Man Turns Invisible After Yoga
text: A viral story falsely claimed a man became invisible after 10 years of yoga.

title: New Expressway Connects Delhi and Lucknow
text: India inaugurated a new six-lane expressway between Delhi and Lucknow.

title: School Teaches Students To Fly Without Planes
text: A fake story claimed a Bengaluru school teaches students to fly.

title: India Overtakes UK As Fifth Largest Economy
text: IMF reported that India has surpassed the UK to become the fifth-largest global economy.

title: Minister Claims Eating Papaya Prevents Earthquakes
text: A false claim spread that eating papaya can prevent earthquakes.

title: ISRO To Send Indian Astronauts To Moon
text: ISRO announced plans for its first manned lunar mission by 2030.

title: Goa Beaches Covered In Gold Dust
text: A fake viral video showed Goa beaches covered in gold dust.

title: UP Government Launches Solar Rooftop Scheme
text: Uttar Pradesh launched a new solar rooftop scheme for households.

title: Man Builds House From Plastic Waste
text: An Indian engineer constructed a house entirely from recycled plastic waste.

title: Government Plans Free Water Supply In Rural Areas
text: The Centre announced a new scheme for free water supply in rural households.

title: Aliens Hack Indian Satellites
text: Fake news spread claiming aliens had hacked Indian satellites.

title: India Records Highest Wheat Production
text: India achieved record-breaking wheat production this year.

title: Man Claims He Can Fly Over Himalayas
text: A social media user falsely claimed he can fly unaided over the Himalayas.

title: Tata Motors Launches New Electric Car
text: Tata Motors unveiled its latest affordable EV for Indian roads.

title: Fake Doctor Treats Patients With Magic
text: Police arrested a fake doctor treating patients using 'magic powder'.
